homepage.message: StormWiki is a well-maintained open-source wikipedia for Stormworks. This wiki has documentation on main features, standards and more!
homepage.less-searching-description: Spend less time searching for documentation and more time building creations.

feature-section.title: Everything you'd expect from a Stormworks knowledge base
feature-section.description: Opinionated and designed for daily use.

components.title: Components
components.description: Information and advanced tutorials for every component in the game.

standards.title: Standards
standards.description: Implementation guides and info for every widely used community-made standard.

game-mechanics.title: Game Mechanics
game-mechanics.description: Documentation for game mechanics, like the weight system.

tutorials.title: Tutorials
tutorials.description: Quality tutorials made by Stormworks YouTubers all in one place.

continous-updates.title: Continous Updates
continous-updates.description: This wiki is continously updated for every future release of Stormworks.

active-community.title: Active Community
active-community.description: We're a team of active Stormworkers ready to help you whenever you need.

growing-section.title: StormWiki is growing quickly
growing-section.description: We're dedicated to improving the experience and performance of StormWiki.

seo.title: StormWiki - A simple, modular and accessible component library that gives you the building blocks you need to build your React applications.
seo.description: Simple, Modular and Accessible UI Components for your React Applications. Built with Styled System

notfound.heading: 404 | Page Not Found
notfound.message: This page doesn't exist... the sadness.üò¢

tutorialError.heading: Ooops something broke üò≠
tutorialError.message: You just found a really nasty issue. We are aware of it. Just hit 'Reload' and carry on!

team.title: StormWiki Team
team.message: Amazing engineers who have contributed time, effort, and thought to StormWiki. Without them, this project would not be possible.

seo.title: StormWiki Team and Contributors
seo.description: List of team members and contributors that make the StormWiki project possible.

discord-strip.heading: Connect with the community
discord-strip.description: Feel free to ask questions, report issues, and meet new people.
